send_message.name: Send a Signal message
send_message.description: Sends a message to one or more recipients via the Signal API.

recipients.name: Recipients
recipients.description: The phone numbers of the recipients, separated by semicolons.

notify_self.name: Notify self
notify_self.description: If enabled, the message will also be sent to the sender's own number.

text_mode.name: Text mode
text_mode.description: Defines how the text should be treated. 'styled' allows for formatting.
